content.rendered:
Directed by Charlotte Wells

Written by Charlotte Wells

Star Paul Mescal(Calum). Frankie Corio(Sophie (as Francesca Corio)). Celia Rowlson-Hall(Adult Sophie).Rest of cast listed alphabetically:. Kayleigh Coleman(Jane). Sally Messham(Belinda). Harry Perdios(Toby). Ethan Smith(Scott). Ruby Thompson(Laura). Brooklyn Toulson(Michael)

Language English

Producers Lia Buman. Mark Ceryak. Ipek Erden. Lizzie Francke. Kieran Hannigan. Tim Headington. Amy Jackson. Barry Jenkins. Ana Leocha. Adele Romanski. Neil Shah. Alex Sutherland. Eva Yates

Production AZ Celtic Films. BBC Film. PASTEL
